definition: to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items

sentences.english: Abides by the Sofitel Employee Handbook.
sentences.chinese: 遵守索菲特酒店員工守則。

sentences.english: POW is still legally bound by the Uniform Code of Military Justice and ethically guided by the Code of Conduct.
sentences.chinese: 戰俘依然受軍法約束，以及軍人守則的道德指導。

sentences.english: Section 3. Cardholders are required to comply with this Code of Practice.
sentences.chinese: 第三條持卡人須遵守本守則。

sentences.english: After that, determine the compliance issues which pertain to your company.
sentences.chinese: 在此之後，確定一份有關你的公司的守則。

sentences.english: They called for greater transparency and a new code of ethics.
sentences.chinese: 他們要求更高的透明度和一個新的道德守則。

sentences.english: More than 26 percent have sacked employees for violation of Internet policies.
sentences.chinese: 超過26%的公司因員工違反網絡守則而將其解僱。

sentences.english: This rules finally explained the power turns over to Five Austria Kinking Healthy body to possess.
sentences.chinese: 本守則最終解釋權歸五奧康祺健身所有。

sentences.english: Suppliers are expected to communicate this Code to all employees and to their suppliers.
sentences.chinese: 供給商估計將本守則，一切員工和他們地供給商。

sentences.english: Would you like to subscribe to our mailing list. This will keep you updated with up coming events, and news.
sentences.chinese: 一定要打勾同意公司守則，然後點提交表格。

sentences.english: Please keep SBC Career Development Training Course Regulations.
sentences.chinese: 自覺遵守《職業發展課程學生守則》。

sentences.english: The Code can be amended through the simplified procedure set out in Article XV of the Convention.
sentences.chinese: 守則可以通過公約第十五條規定的簡化程序來修訂。

sentences.english: By uncovering the Mayan codes, Arguelles discovered the telepathic nature of time.
sentences.chinese: 由發現瑪雅守則，列斯發現了心靈感應性質時間。

sentences.english: The term “code” is usually associated with a profession.
sentences.chinese: “守則”一詞通常與某一專門職業相聯。

sentences.english: Warranty period subject to operational instruction and using Code.
sentences.chinese: 保用期內需符合及按使用守則操作方法。

sentences.english: Secretary for Security Ambrose Lee Siu-kwong said the case was a total breach of customs guidelines.
sentences.chinese: 保安局長李少光表示，日本做法是違反所有海關守則。

sentences.english: The required qualifications will be specified in codes of practice.
sentences.chinese: 特許驗船師的要求資格，將在工作守則內闡明。

definition: norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
